name: Norvina Pro Pigment Palette Vol. 2 for Face & Body
about: What it is:A professional-grade artistry palette featuring 25 deluxe-size, high-performance shades with maximum payoff and a gorgeous, aqua-themed color story..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and phthalates. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:This palette contains 25 professional pigments in a wide range of highly pigmented, aqua-themed colors to offer limitless possibilities. Itu2019s perfect for the artist who wants to have the ultimate color collection and for the makeup fanatic who is ready to take their makeup creativity to the next level..This Palette Contains:
ingredients: A2: .Talc, Mica, Kaolin, Silica, Synthetic Wax, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Decylene Glycol, Hydrated Silica, Methicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ptfe, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492). ..A3: .Mica, Octyldodecanol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Talc, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Wax, Boron Nitride, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Decylene Glycol, Hydrated Silica, Tin Oxide, Ptfe, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)...A5: . how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply light shades to highlight and accentuate features. .-Apply medium shades to contour and transition color for a blended finish. .-Apply deeper shades to define and line..-Use a fluffy brush to blend..... Precautions:.-A1, A4, B2, B4, C3, C5, D2, D3, D5, E4, and E5 are not intended for use around the immediate eye area..-Little pressure is needed when picking up product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this palette! there are so many options for creating with this, and I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and payoff of the shadows for such a large palette. I use this often.

The colors are beautiful and some of them have good payoff, but the darker colors are horrible.  Every time I try to blend them into the crease, they become extremely patchy.  I have tried different brushes and primers, but havenu2019t had any luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing! Nice colours, long-lasting and extremely pigmented. Love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Suuuuper pigmented, too pricyu2026..  other places may have her too. But the black shade in this palette ufffcthe black shade is suppper goood.
